instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: 820-00165 bios chip was corrupted due to corrosion after replace new bios it works fine except touch pad. It works with other working unit. Any help please.Thanks.

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: So the same trackpad works with other board?

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message:
We have several BIOS files with clean ME, posted for 820-00165.
Did you test any, or just replace U6100 chip from other board?

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: I just replace the u6100 bcz my original chip was damaged.

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: Flash clean ME BIOS from the forum.

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: Rewrite the bios but now i see my t/p getting too hot and this is short, mac  works fine except t/p,  i am wondering is there any relation with bios new programmed bcz customer said t/p works before.

threads.title: 820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
820-00165 touch pad not works after rewrite bios
threads.message: OMG, t/p itself short. Replace it now it works. Thanks. Fixed.
